text.headline: My Professional Journey
text.text:
A timeline of key milestones that highlight my technical growth, problem-solving abilities, and dedication to excellence. Each achievement showcases my skills and contributions across various projects.
Discover why I'm prepared to add value to your organization at the conclusion.

media.caption: The Setubal Peninsula, just south of Lisbon.

text.headline: Bruno M. Guerreiro
text.text: was born in Setubal, Portugal. When he was 10 and asked about his future profession, he wanted to 'know things no one has discovered yet'.

media.caption: Attending one of the weekly discourses with the NOVA Debate team. The topic was gender equality in sports.

text.headline:
NOVA Debate
Content Coordinator
text.text: Bruno also enrolled the NOVA Debate student nucleus, in pursuit of further intellectual prowess. He played a content coordinator and curator role for several debating sessions after his PhD work, refining his public speaking, managing, mentoring and conflict resolution skills.

text.headline: Media Exposure
text.text: Bruno's milestones eventually caught up to him. Bruno was interviewed for Jornal Expresso and his work was featured in print. Also, his work in Berkeley featured in a special issue of Forbes focusing on cryopreservation as futuristic medical tech. He was also invited to the Unexpected Data podcast to share his efforts in bridging cryopreservation with data science.
